blog.name: incorrect-marauders
blog.title: incorrect marauders quotes
blog.description: incorrect quotes (or are they totally correct?) said by moony, padfoot, wormtail, and prongs. lilykins, snivellus, and minnie make some appearances.

summary:
Lily: So, in about four billion years, the Earth will be consumed by the sun.
Sirius: The sun has a vore kink.
Lily: Professor...
body:
Lily: So, in about four billion years, the Earth will be consumed by the sun.
Sirius: The sun has a vore kink.
Lily: Professor McGonagall, I’d like to move seats.

summary:
THE WORLD ON FIRE

 while the order of the phoenix fights the onward march of the death eaters with stealth, espionage, and a...
caption:
THE WORLD ON FIRE

while the order of the phoenix fights the onward march of the death eaters with stealth, espionage, and a well-placed auror or two, across wizarding britain other groups combat blood purism with methods cruel or crude, depending on who you ask. to these vigilantes, a dark mark isn’t what makes a man guilty - being a blood purist is crime enough. citizens are collateral, and anyone is fair game.

this and more onhalys, a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in mid-1980 at the height of the first wizarding war.

→ INDEX | GUIDEBOOK | CANON LIST | REQUESTS | SUBPLOT: ANTI-PURIST TERRORISM

blog.name: s-e-v-e-r-u-s-s-n-a-p-e
blog.title: Severus Snape's Place
blog.description:
The is the home of Severus Snape. It will be filled with all things Severus.

You may ask him questions if you wish, but it is his right whether he wishes to answer and when, for he may not always be amused at your questions, and you may not always like his answers. Enjoy the pictures, quotes, comments and reblogs.

Posts Snape found amusing

The Dark Arts are many, varied, ever-changing and eternal. Fighting them is like fighting a many-headed monster, which, each time a neck is severed, sprouts a head even fiercer and cleverer than before. You are fighting that which is unfixed, mutating, indestructible. - SS

- Images or art which are uncredited means I do not know who created/owns it. If you see something that is yours and want it credited or removed. Do let me know.

- This blog is created and intended for enjoyment.
- Not associated with Alan Rickman.
- Severus Snape © JKR
- Theme best viewed on computers with 1280 x 768 resolutions.
- Original Theme: PixelUnion

summary: I have absolutely no idea where the weird-ass fanon that Grindelwald was more powerful than Voldemort comes from. Maybe people...
body:
I have absolutely no idea where the weird-ass fanon that Grindelwald was more powerful than Voldemort comes from. Maybe people just don’t like Voldemort? Which, I mean, fair. He’s a terrible person. But he’s also indisputably stated multiple times by the author herself to be the single most powerful Dark Wizard who ever lived. Oh, even in Pottermore, a reliable site.

As a dark wizard, Grindelwald is on that list. Presumably directly after Voldemort. But come on, everyone.

The statement that Voldemort is vastly less powerful than Dumbledore is simply ridiculous. If Dumbledore felt he could just walk up to Voldemort and take him out instantly, he absolutely would have. But he didn’t (the Horcruxes are not an excuse. He didn’t know anything about them in the First Wizarding War).  Because when they did duel, it was nothing even close to the obscene curb stomp battle so many people act like it is. They fought to a standstill, undoing each others spells and never once severely damaging the other .

What reason would Dumbledore have to hold back? If he could stop Voldemort’s reign right then and there, incapacitating him so he couldn’t cause any trouble while his horcruxes are dealt with, he would’ve. No.

Sorry, but this Grindelwald > Voldemort stuff is flat-out bizarre. Grindelwald was an extremely powerful wizard, but Voldemort’s status as the greatest Dark Wizard of all time is repeated almost ad nauseam when he’s brought up.

And, please, stop with this nonsense that Voldemort was feared only in Britain.

Voldemort didn’t care about Europe, not before having conquered Britain, but he was still feared in all the world:

1)JKR said that Voldemort’s actions affected everyone, not only Britain.

2) During the Quidditch World Cup, all the wizards ran away when they saw the Dark Mark. They were only British people? No. They were wizards from all the world.

3)Voldemort was recognised by Gregorovitch, a German lady and a foreign family in Deathly Hallows. They were terrified of him.

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

After a year of Death Eater captivity, the return of AMELIA BONES has shaken up the Wizarding World of England. As the Death Eaters try desperately to quiet Amelia and those who attempt to speak her truth, the rebel group Aversio rushes in to capitalize on her thirst for violence and quest for revenge, leaving the Order of Phoenix to wonder if their attempts at peace are as futile as they seem. Just as things seem bleak, the Daily Prophet headquarters burns high on one August night, lighting a path of opportunity for the Aversio propaganda THE QUIBBLER to make its way through the community as the public scrambles for information. With Death Eaters controlling the Ministry and Aversio terrorizing the streets, this small spark of rebellion has turned into a fire that threatens to D E S T R O Y everything in its path.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!

summary:
Gryffindor: Don’t you dare. Don’t you dare do this to me. 
Slytherin: I have to do it, it’s for the greater good. 
Gryffindor:...
body:
Gryffindor: Don’t you dare. Don’t you dare do this to me.

Slytherin: I have to do it, it’s for the greater good.

Gryffindor: But you said you loved me….

Slytherin: If saving the greater good meant I have to lose you, I’m willing to sacrifice everything.

Ravenclaw: Are you gonna buy it?

Slytherin: Yep, gimme Boardwalk and put in a hotel.

Gryffindor: *flips board over and points to Slytherin* You’re dead to me.

So you’re a normal muggle walking the streets of london and everything is normal then a muthafuker comes out of nowhere and calls himself a lord and to your surprise he has no fucking nose . NONEEE!!! and to make matters worse he’s threatening you with a bloody stick A STICKKK!!

Side note he has a badass tatto on his arm tho.

blog.name: blindfreddy325
blog.title: Freddy's Fandom Stuffs
blog.description: I’m a 17 year Fangirl, I’m a table tennis playing flautist, Whovian, Halfblooded Hufflepuff, Ranger’s apprentice, Shadowhunting Avenger that’s divergent and survived the Maze and the Huger games. Who is quite a fan of Broadway despite living in Australia? I've also got FND making me legally blind and in a wheelchair amongst other symptoms. I’m not a great drawer but if anyone DMs me I’m happy to attempt any picture requests.

I guess I mean I don't really have a choice but I also wanna make sure you don't get kidnapped
Tru

body:
I guess I mean I don’t really have a choice but I also wanna make sure you don’t get kidnapped

Tru

…I didn’t register being an animagus

Oof crushing

That’s creepy ok stranger danger

…you guys are friends?

…ok I laughed

summary: Hagrid, THE KING OF EVERYTHING, just wanted to remind you that you are the absolute best. Can you, like, be my dad? Please? <3

blog.name: crimsonrevolt-promo
blog.title: crimson revolt promo
blog.description: Crimson Revolt is a multi-para, literate roleplay group that takes place during the First Wizarding War. The group focuses on character and plot development through the themes of war and death. All edits posted here were created by the admins and members of Crimson Revolt and were posted with permission. For more information, please visit the main @crimsonrevolt.

summary: CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES   “How dreadful…     to be caught in a  G A M E         and have no idea...
caption:
CRIMSON REVOLT ♔ CHARACTERS ♔ NAVIGATION ♔ ASK ♔ RULES

“How dreadful…

to be caught in a G A M E

and have no idea of the rules.”

A FIRST WIZARDING WAR ROLEPLAY.

After a year of Death Eater captivity, the return of AMELIA BONES has shaken up the Wizarding World of England. As the Death Eaters try desperately to quiet Amelia and those who attempt to speak her truth, the rebel group Aversio rushes in to capitalize on her thirst for violence and quest for revenge, leaving the Order of Phoenix to wonder if their attempts at peace are as futile as they seem. Just as things seem bleak, the Daily Prophet headquarters burns high on one August night, lighting a path of opportunity for the Aversio propaganda THE QUIBBLER to make its way through the community as the public scrambles for information. With Death Eaters controlling the Ministry and Aversio terrorizing the streets, this small spark of rebellion has turned into a fire that threatens to D E S T R O Y everything in its path.

WHAT ARE WE LOOKING FOR?

We are a group of writers dedicated to plot and character development. As an 18+ group, we’re looking for mature, dedicated, and passionate people seeking a long term roleplay that will focus on themes such as war and death. Most threads on the dash are full of substance, which means most are paragraphs or longer gif chats! The Admin Team posts prompts, plot drops, and events as needed, averaging 1-2 major plot drops per month with smaller challenges and events in between. If you’re looking for a plot heavy group with surprises and twists, come apply today!
